original_text: The king will take your daughters to serve him. They will have to make perfume for him. They will also have to cook and bake bread for him.
korean_text: 그가 또 너희의 딸들을 데려다가 향료 만드는 자와 요리하는 자와 떡 굽는 자로 삼을 것이며

sentences.original_text: The king will take your daughters
They will have to make perfume for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 위해 향유를 만들어야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will also have to cook

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 위해 빵을 굽게 될 것이다
